[b][color=white]HF XMPP Downtime & Future of XMPP?[/color][/b]
After bringing back the HF XMPP that has been running for a while now, Omniscient brought up the thought of making a public XMPP under the domain hacker.im. He's considering doing so and might be already in development. [i][size=x-small][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5718189] >>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Silent Departure[/color][/b]
Omniscient went on vacation and this was his longest one yet. Upon return, I personally noticed him replying a lot quicker; damn that vacation energized him. Check out his Instagram for potential pictures of his trip. [i][size=x-small][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5718091] >>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Poor Diets Have a Hand in 1 in 5 Deaths[/color][/b] 
You've read correctly. According to what is said to be the most accurate study ever conducted on this subject, 1 in 5 deaths can be at least partially linked to poor diet. This study defined a poor diet as a diet that is low in whole grains, fruit, nuts and seeds and fish oils and high in salt. The study compiled a myriad of information ranging from data gathered by the Institute of Health Metrics and Evaluation at the University of Washington, to five separate papers published by the Lancet medical journal on life expectancy. Their findings weren't all grim however, people are living longer than any point in history. Now for something a little more sobering, diet has become the second leading cause of death across the planet superseded only by high systolic blood pressure. There are some good graphs in the source article of all the leading causes that I recommend you take a look at. This is personally a shock to me, what about you all? I had always known it was a problem of course, but not anywhere near this degree.  [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.theguardian.com/society/2017/sep/14/poor-diet-is-a-factor-in-one-in-five-deaths-global-disease-study-reveals]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Study Believes United States Rise is Cannabis use not Linked to Legalization[/color][/b] 
As one would expect, the rate of Cannabis use is steadily growing in the United States. Researchers at the Public Health Institute's Alcohol Research Group analyzed data from periodic National Alcohol Surveys and stacked the periods of change in local laws. They instead attribute it to changes in the public perception of Cannabis as well as the mystique surrounding it.  "The steep rise in marijuana use in the United States since 2005 occurred across the population and is attributable to general period effects not specifically linked to the liberalization of marijuana policies in some states," says the published paper's abstract. I am not lucky enough to live in a state that has embraced recreational so I am not really able to comment. How about you all? [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.forbes.com/sites/tomangell/2017/09/14/study-rise-in-marijuana-use-not-caused-by-legalization/#213675e551b7]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Google’s New Payment App for India Uses Sound to Transfer Money[/color][/b]
Google has presented another payment app in India called Tez (the Hindi word for "fast"). Tez highlights an innovation called sound QR that enables users to transfer money utilizing sounds to combine two gadgets. Called the "cash mode option," phones arrange an association using sound to recognize the payer and payee. (The sounds ought to be unintelligible to human ears however because they're sent utilizing ultrasonic frequencies, as per the Financial Times.) The element is along these lines like money exchanges which don't require the trading of individual points of interest like bank accounts and telephone numbers. Money Mode works with any phone with a mic and speaker, and Tez application introduced and didn't require an NFC chip. Google's Audio QR innovation is like Chirp, which additionally sends information encoded in ultrasonic sound. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.theverge.com/2017/9/18/16325004/tez-google-india-audio-qr-cash-payments]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Samsung Finally Lets You Disable the Annoying Bixby Button[/color][/b]
Samsung first presented its new Bixby voice assistant prior this year on the Galaxy S8 with a committed button on the handset. The Galaxy Note 8 likewise incorporates the Bixby button; however, Samsung has declined to enable proprietors of the two gadgets to redo the button and change it from the advanced right hand to something more helpful. The Galaxy S8 creator even went similarly as blocking outsider applications from opening the button, a move that has disappointed numerous S8 owners.
Samsung is throwing in the towel marginally today, on account of a refresh that lets Galaxy S8 and Note 8 owners prevent the Bixby button from propelling Bixby Home. The refresh doesn't have all the earmarks of being accessible on each gadget, yet Sammobile has seen it's gradually taking off to existing handsets. The alternative to impair the Bixby button will be an appreciated expansion for those baffled by inadvertently setting off the collaborator. It's anything but difficult to get the Galaxy S8 and press the Bixby button by oversight, and a few owners have grumbled about incidentally squeezing it when attempting to change framework volume as the Bixby button is found just underneath the volume down button. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.theverge.com/circuitbreaker/2017/9/18/16325050/samsung-bixby-button-galaxy-s8-note-8-disable]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]PlayerUnknown's Battlegrounds Beats Dota 2's Highest Concurrent Player Record[/color][/b] 
PUBG still stands as one of the most popular games since its release back in March. Most recently, PlayerUnknown's Battlegrounds beat Dota 2's record of concurrent players, with a total of 1.3 million active players. For those unaware, Dota 2 has currently 1.2 million active players. Since March of this year, the game itself has achieved many different things from active players, most streamed game on the game streaming website Twitch and much more! What makes this achievement even better is the fact that the game is still in its developing state in early access. With the implementation of a new update not too long ago where PlayerUnknown's team added new guns, a fog map, and a few tweaks, there is probably much more to come. [i][size=x-small][url=http://www.pcgamer.com/playerunknowns-battlegrounds-beats-dota-2s-highest-concurrent-player-record/]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Ana, Junkrat, and a Giant Two-Player Robot Are Coming to Heroes of the Storm[/color][/b] 
If you are a fan of Blizzard's work, then you probably know that they like to sometimes put characters from other games into their other ones. For example, in World of Warcraft, you have the chance to get a Baby Winston pet. Winston is a character from Blizzard's game, Overwatch.  Coming to Blizzard's MOBA, Heroes of the Storm, are some new characters, some being from other Blizzard games. In addition, a new map will be added with this update. The map is supposed to be similar or replicate the Overwatch Hanamura and will have Overwatch-style objectives. On this map, players will have to fight like the King of the Hill mode on Overwatch where each team tries to conquer the point. Ana and Junkrat will be making their appearance in the MOBA world of Heroes of the Storm. Will they be game changers? [i][size=x-small][url=http://www.pcgamer.com/hots-volskaya-map/]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Free Charizard For Pokemon Sun And Moon Coming Soon[/color][/b] 
The giant lizard Charizard, yep lizard and not a dragon that is probably in the top three most popular Pokemon of all time can soon be yours on Pokemon Sun and Moon. Starting next month on October 1, those who visit and local target have the chance to receive their very own Charizard. Unlike other events Pokemon has done, this Pokemon is actually level 50, rather than 100. Another thing to note is that this offer will not go on for a month like most of their events do. This event will only last 13 days. Once the code is obtained, it is redeemed like every other code. You go to the mystery gift option on your game at the starting menu. From there, you then click on the option to redeem a code and enter it in. Once that is done, you will have to visit a deliveryman at any Pokemon Center on Alola. Not only is Target having their little promo, so is Gamestop. On October ninth, you will have the chance to also get a Marshadow which will also be level 50. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.gamespot.com/articles/free-charizard-for-pokemon-sun-and-moon-coming-soo/1100-6453378/]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]
